LanguageData.DMSRC_BigHole.label: facility dormer
LanguageData.DMSRC_BigHole.description: A structure flooring with a opened hole, commonly found in underground facilities.
LanguageData.DMSRC_CompactGenerator.label: compact generator
LanguageData.DMSRC_CompactGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.DMSRC_DecoyDish.label: decoy dish
LanguageData.DMSRC_DecoyDish.description: A modified radio dish which is rigged to send a high power burst transmission. Once activated it puts out a powerful decoy signal which will attract a feral group of automatroid forces to attack your colony. If you can defeat them, you can collect the advanced technology from their corpses. The signal pulse burns out the transmitter, so this building can only be used once.
LanguageData.DMSRC_FacilityEntrance.label: facility dormer
LanguageData.DMSRC_FacilityEntrance.description: A structure flooring with a opened hole, commonly found in underground facilities.
LanguageData.DMSRC_MediumHole.label: facility dormer
LanguageData.DMSRC_MediumHole.description: A structure flooring with a opened hole, commonly found in underground facilities.
LanguageData.DMSRC_SmallHole.label: facility dormer
LanguageData.DMSRC_SmallHole.description: A structure flooring with a opened hole, commonly found in underground facilities.
LanguageData.DMSRC_SmallHole_Exit.label: ancient stockpile exit
LanguageData.DMSRC_SmallHole_Exit.description: A ladder which links to the surface hatch above.
LanguageData.DMSRC_TimedBombActive.label: timed bomb
LanguageData.DMSRC_TimedBombActive.description: A hermetically-sealed armored container for preserving valuable items. Special security system will destroy any contents if container is destroyed or deconstucted.
